tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE local_water_regulations (
  regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  regulation_name VARCHAR(255),
  compliance_status BOOLEAN,
  inspection_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE water_regulations (
    regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    regulation_name VARCHAR(100),
    regulatory_body VARCHAR(100),
    enforcement_date DATE,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE inspection_records (
    inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    regulation_id INT,
    inspection_date DATE,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(100),
    inspection_result BOOLEAN,
    CONSTRAINT fk_regulation FOREIGN KEY (regulation_id) REFERENCES water_regulations(regulation_id)
);

CREATE TABLE violation_records (
    violation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    inspection_id INT,
    violation_date DATE,
    violation_description TEXT,
    fine_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    CONSTRAINT fk_inspection FOREIGN KEY (inspection_id) REFERENCES inspection_records(inspection_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Water_Regulations (
    regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    regulation_name VARCHAR(255),
    jurisdiction VARCHAR(50),
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Compliance_Records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    regulation_id INT,
    record_date DATE,
    compliance_level VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (regulation_id) REFERENCES Water_Regulations(regulation_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Organizations (
    organization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    organization_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Contacts (
    contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    organization_id INT,
    contact_name VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (organization_id) REFERENCES Organizations(organization_id)
)

CREATE TABLE regulations (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    type VARCHAR(20),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_records (
    record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    regulation_id UUID REFERENCES regulations(id),
    status VARCHAR(20),
    notes TEXT,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_agencies (
    agency_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    agency_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(50),
    contact_person VARCHAR(50),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE violation_reports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    record_id UUID REFERENCES compliance_records(record_id),
    violation_description TEXT,
    severity VARCHAR(20),
    report_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE inspection_records (
    inspection_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    agency_id UUID REFERENCES regulatory_agencies(agency_id),
    inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
    inspection_date TIMESTAMP,
    result VARCHAR(20)
)
